H0.text: High hardness is a characteristic of sedimentary rock.

H1.text: Glassy texture is a characteristic of sedimentary rock.

H2.text: Contains fossils is a characteristic of sedimentary rock.

H3.text: Shiny silver luster is a characteristic of sedimentary rock.

A4.text: They contain fossils, the preserved remains of ancient plants and animals.

A5.text: Sedimentary rocks can contain fossils because, unlike most igneous and metamorphic rocks, they form at temperatures and pressures that do not destroy fossil remains.
